name: 3dCompareAffine
author: RWCox - Mar 2020 at the Tulsa bootcamp
description: Compares two (or more) affine spatial transformations on a dataset and outputs measurements of their differences in spatial displacements.

inputs.description: Dataset containing non-zero voxels used as the region over which to compare the affine transformations.
inputs.name: Mask

inputs.description: Dataset to compute an automask from it and use that mask as the spatial region for comparison.
inputs.name: Dataset

inputs.description: Input an affine transformation (file or 'MATRIX'). Multiple '-affine' options can be used to input multiple files.
inputs.name: Affine transformation

output-files.description: Output file containing comparison results of affine transformations
output-files.name: Output Comparison File
